question_text: A user wants to use NFC for authentication. Which two conditions must typically be satisfied?
answer_options: The phone must be connected to Wi-Fi
The NFC feature must be enabled
The user must physically tap or hover near the other device
Location services must be turned on
The phone must have a physical SIM card
correct_answer: The NFC feature must be enabled
The user must physically tap or hover near the other device
explanation: NFC authentication requires active proximity and an enabled NFC interface; Wi-Fi and SIM are unrelated to its function.
